Sentencas: We have found that the oxygen excess-type LSO (OE-LSO), namely La10Si6O27 on weighted basis, exhibited high conductivity, and substitution of the Si-site of LSO with some dopants (Mn+) had a positive effect toward the conducting property.
Titulo: Effect of cation doping on ionic and electronic properties for lanthanum silicate-based solid electrolytes

Sentencas: Furthermore, it was also found that addition of a very small amount of iron ions into the M-doped OE-LSO, La-10(Si6-yMyn+)O27-(2-0.5n)y, improved its conductivity.
Titulo: Effect of cation doping on ionic and electronic properties for lanthanum silicate-based solid electrolytes

Sentencas: On the other hand, replacement of the La-site with various ions for La-10(Si6-yMyn+)O27-(2-0.5n)y did little to improve conductivity.
Titulo: Effect of cation doping on ionic and electronic properties for lanthanum silicate-based solid electrolytes

Sentencas: Conductivity for each sample was unchanged under humidified atmosphere at 1073 K sustained for over 50 h, revealing that both compositions were chemically stable.
Titulo: Effect of cation doping on ionic and electronic properties for lanthanum silicate-based solid electrolytes

Sentencas: It was concluded that 0.995{La-10(Si5.8Al0.2)O-26.9}-0.005(FeO gamma) is suitable for the fuel cell electrolytes because of its high and almost pure ionic conductivity, and its good chemical stability under humidified as well as reducing conditions.
